description:
Reliable fire starters for unreliable weather. These lead-free matches stay lit through gusting wind and pouring rain, and come in a water-tight container to keep them protected. A great addition to any emergency kit.

  • Contains 20 wind- and waterproof matches
  • Screw-on cap is waterproofed with an O-ring
  • Two striking surfaces are protected inside the case
  • Each match burns for 12 seconds
  • Long, 5.4cm matchsticks protect fingers against burns
name: UCO Hurricane Survival Matches
